amendment.description: To provide transparency and accountability in funding for conferences and meetings of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3288 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3288 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Shelby. (consideration: CR S12846-12847; text: CR S12846) To provide transparency and accountability in funding for conferences and meetings of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3288 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3288 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Shelby.
